Title: Saving Sally
Writer: Carlo Ledesma (screenplay), Avid Liongoren, Charlene Sawit-Esguerra
Actors: Rhian Ramos, Enzo Marcos, TJ Trinidad, Archie Adamos
Plot: In a typical teen film about love, monsters, and gadgets, Marty, an aspiring comic-book artist, secretly loves his gadget inventor best friend, Sally, and fantasizes of saving her from the big bad world.
